entries.title: South Africa to Host China and Russia for Military Exercises

entries.title: Climate Poses Difficult Problem for Central Banks Given Long-Term Nature
entries.description: A wind farm is shown near Pincher Creek, Alta., in a file photo. Investments in renewable energy have been dampened by rapidly rising interest rates as central bankers attempt to fulfil their mandates to fight inflation. (The Canadian Press/Jeff McIntosh)

entries.title: Al Gore Hits Climate Alarm in Davos With Warning of ‘Boiling’ Oceans and ‘Rain Bombs’

(Joseph EID / AFP via Getty Images)
